main event: On August 9, 1968, observers in Dayton, Kentucky reported seeing a UFO with spinning lights and a disc shape, estimated to be 60 feet in diameter, hovering 30 feet above a field.
interesting points: The UFO appeared to have spinning lights on its bottom, resembling designs typically attributed to aerial advertising planes,The object was noted to have a pulsating motion and emitted no sound,The sighting caused significant fear among the witnesses, making them run back to their car,The sighting duration was described as very brief, lasting only a few moments,The location of the sighting was very close to Cincinnati, where an aerial advertising plane was known to be operating that night.
